attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
crush old cars in goverment run crushers< say up to ten yrs old>recive a recite for £5'000 &  take this to any 
car showroom for new car.this will create more work for the car & steel workers.& all so the three to four thousand firms that supply the carmaker industry.

rejection.details: Please amend your title. It should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, rather than your name. This is what visitors to the site will have to look at to tell them what your petition is about.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
